mapper.sql: mode_id, dru_mode_id, mode_url, mode_name, mode_code, mode_explain, isva, optime, oper, sort
mapper.select: select * from drug_module where isva ='是' and dru_mode_id is null

SELECT * FROM drug_module mo,drug_role ro,drug_module_role mr,drug_admin ad,drug_admin_role ar WHERE ad.admin_id = ar.admin_id AND ar.role_id = ro.role_id AND ro.role_id = mr.role_id AND mr.mode_id = mo.mode_id AND ad.admin_id=#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mo.dru_mode_id IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into drug_module (mode_id, dru_mode_id, mode_url, mode_name, mode_code, mode_explain, isva, optime, oper, sort) values (#{modeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{druModeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modeExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update drug_module
dru_mode_id = #{druModeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mode_url = #{modeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mode_name = #{modeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mode_code = #{modeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mode_explain = #{modeExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mode_id = #{modeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update drug_module set dru_mode_id = #{druModeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mode_url = #{modeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mode_name = #{modeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mode_code = #{modeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mode_explain = #{modeExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mode_id = #{modeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
